values:
I'm called to be something...
Something more than I can be...


I love possessions, but I love God more.
I love friends, but I love God more.
I love my church, but I love God more.
I love my family, but I love God more.
Someday I will have a wife, but I will love God more.
Someday I will have children, but I will love God more.
Someday I will be a man who will love God more.

I am trying to be a man. I am trying to love my friends and my family and my God. I try, but I cannot. By myself, I cannot. I have failed before I started to try. I have failed before my first thought. And yet, I have also succeeded, in Christ. I have loved when Christ loved. And I died on the cross through Him. I pray you will turn me from my wicked ways, dear God. I pray for forgiveness and for redemption, for wisdom and for patience, for grace and for mercy. Give me the strength I am without, give me the strength to love. Amen.

I am trying so hard, everyone...please, pray for me. And be patient with me, when I cannot with you.

~Aaron

P.S. I miss my brother...

personality tests by similarminds.com Ok, I just did a bunch of stuff. But it was fun. I hope everyone is doing well. Much love from my end. Take care and GOD BLEEEESSSSS!!!

Uh...my will is weak and my stench is promising. Sad times... 1. Go here. 2. Pass it on. 1.~How did you meet sleepless_one? She saved my life from starving artists. They were REAL hungry. 2.~What would you do if you had never met samsonizzle? ...sleep? 3.~What do you honestly think of johny_law? He looks like Michael Palin 4.~Would or did poetic_chic and magusofthewest go out? It was all metaphysical 5.~Have you ever liked beforetherewas? Liked? I love that man! 6.~If adeia_fae died tomorrow, what is one thing that you would need him/her to know? That I really wish she came to know and love Jesus, because I've been praying for her, because I love her 7.~Would 16th_pedestrian and lost_you_again make a good couple? hmmm...they'd be a ton load of fun!...not that they aren't by themselves... 8.~Describe dragolos_cross in 3 words: Eight Drunk Silversmiths 9.~Do you think neath_my_mask is hot? ha ha! Some people think I might! ha ha no, sorry, that's gross. 10.~Would adeia_fae and code_keeper make a lovely couple? heggg...they would be looked down on in most circles, I can assure you. 11.~What do you think of when you see magusofthewest? Gorillaz, Wonder Bread, ancient Chinese horticulture, stacks and stacks of Lebanon, etc. 12.~Tell me something humiliating about lost_you_again: heh heh, one time...heh...she was...in love with...JESUS! heheh, duh, who would do THAT! 13.~Do you know any of cilla_valar's family members? I worked with her mom! Who is totally awesome! And...she is too, ofcourse. 14.~What's poetic_chic's favorite color? hmmm....side of beef? I'm not sure... 15.~On a scale of 1-10 how cute is iowa_babe? 10 when she isn't stressed out about things, relax lady! I love you! 16.~What would you do if fatt_hurley just professed their undying love for you? I would make him a candle-lit dinner, whisper in his ear, and then we would play shuffle board into the great and beautiful night! 17.~What language does poetic_chic speak? angrish; angry-english mumble and jumble. I just made that up! dar dar I waylay myself! 18.~Who is punk44 going out with? probably some real awesome guys hot bod by now. 19.~Is mule_babe a boy or a girl? mule babe? Oh, I think she just got the opperation, so it's up in the air right now. *hugs* 20.~Would fiery_rage and fatt_hurley make a good couple? YES 21.~Who do you think poetic_chic would be great with from this list? Did I get David Hasselhoff on this list? 22.~When was the last time you talked to neath_my_mask? uhg....just before I left for Georgia...but not since I've been back grrroooogg!! 23.~What is beforetherewas's favorite band? Gwen Steffani <3 24.~Does 16th_pedestrian have any siblings? yes ma'am, I miss him and his brother (that I've met) 25.~Would you ever date cilla_valar? hmm....I don't know. 26.~Would you ever date dragolos_cross? Too late...I'm so ashamed 27.~Is poetic_chic single? hmmm...I think so, but it's been a while 28.~What is poetic_chic's last name? Okay, Sam...this is bad.... 29.~What is fiery_rage's middle name? Rogers 30~What is johny_law's fantasy? To work for minimum wage at a sheet metal factory, like that'll happen! 31.~Where does mule_babe live? in the army 32.~Would you make out with sleepless_one? I'm pretty sure our relationship is not like that, unless I've been living a strange double life 33.~Are samsonizzle and cilla_valar best friends? I'm not sure if they know eachother, but they are. 34.~Does dragolos_cross like poetic_chic? yea, sure. Is that what you want to hear? 35.~How did you meet fiery_rage? She materialized in a whisp of air while I was in 4th period biology, since then she's been a gold digger that feeds on the dreams of drama queens. True story 36.~Is neath_my_mask older than you? nope. wait, yes. no...fine...yes, no. He's not. But he's shorter! 37.~Is code_keeper the sexiest person alive? heck yes. Plus, his thumbs are so ripped from whomping and rocking the video game world. Keep up the good work cool kid. I hope this offends as few as possible...maybe I'll actually update one of these days...we'll see. Love and hugs and Jesus = life. LOVEOVEVEE

Yea...Looking back on it, I think I missed the intended purpose. But enjoyed it and nobody was hurt...I hope. So, I'm happy about it. But I'm sad in another fasion. I would just like you all to pray for my friend, Terry. Even though you probably dont know him, just please pray for him. He's having a really hard time right now. Well, I love you all and hope you are doing well. And if not, talk to me. I'm ALWAYS here for you. Or just call me cause you feel like it. That's cool too. Much love from my end. Through the grace and mercy of God, Aaron

I think so many people are far too reliant on material things to bring them moments of joy, rather than being happy just sitting and talking or just sitting and thinking, for that matter. I'm not excluding myself, by any means. I just think that I'm sick of people complaining about things that either don't really matter or aren't going to matter in about a day. 

I'm really having trouble finding the point in talking about things with...no point. Like saying something that is just so matter of fact and blatantly obvious that the only thing the person you're talking to can say is, "Uh...yea." Now, there is room for that within the awesome rockin' bounds of joking, but when used outside those confines it seems rather...painfully hollow.
*At this point I'm just working things out in my brain, thanks for bearing with me, if you are*
Anyway, I guess I'm just having a hard time...socially, right now. I don't know if I'm growing disgustingly selfish or if it just seems more of a factor right now so it's a part of me that just hasn't really come out yet. So, if I'm being stupid and self-centered I need to change. If this is just a part of me, I need to work through it some how. If this is both, then I need to go soak my fat head.

P.S. that isn't really a P.S. I would just like to say I'm sorry to everyone for not really talking much via the internet, or via all the options...I've just been trying to get some alone time and some peace and quiet...I hope you can understand and forgive me.

With love that is a gift of God and no doing of my own,
Aaron

P.S. I love you still. *requiem and love is dirt*

Lately I have not been updating mainly because I have been EVER so happy. And I have thought it would be kind of pointless to update. But I decided I would anyway. So, in the words of Hades, "So much for the preliminaries, now on to the main event!"



There is no point in denying truths, but if they are sick, perverted truths then we must try our best to change them, opposed to ignoring them. If we are in trouble with our own sin and we feel like we can't make it of our own volition, then we absolutely MUST have good friends and family who are willing to listen to our cause and try and help keep us accountable with and from ourself. It seems to me that so many people have "friends" that are just in it for themselves. To get what they can out of the relationship while giving back as little as they possibly can, and they can never understand why you would go too far out of your way to do something special for a friend. I think those people need good friends who love them more than they may even know.

I did not really have any particular point, but those things just kinda popped into mind. I really hope that everyone is meeting good days, but I know bad ones come along, so I just want you ALL to know that I'm here for you any time, anywhere. Much love from my end and God bless!

I could really go for some philosophical debate, medium well. With a side of theological and doctrinal debate, but I'd like it if you could just absolutely douse it all in love. Can I get that?

I would just like to say that I love everybody so much and I just can'tw ait to see you and give you a hug and cry because I love you so much. It's okay, don't worry.

Til death do we part,
Aaron

Well I'm definitely not at Cornerstone, but I'm in Michigan! Cornerstone was amazingly cool, hot, dirty, crazy, loud and sunburny. I am sorry if I don't do much on the internet until I get back, but I think I'm going to be pretty busy while I'm here. But, as always and for always, I love you all like no man has loved before. I miss everyone in Iowa and I am loving it with everyone in Michigan. I hope to see you all doing well when I get back. Much love from my end.

In Christ,
Aaron

Going to Cornerstone in Illinois! I'm very excited!!! I get to see amazing people! Take care everyone. Please be as awesome as you always are. God bless. I love you all so much. Be well. Until July 9th...

You clever little optimist. You've spent your life smiling about emptiness. You've been fattened by these thoughts of wellbeing and all your social prowess. You're walking tall. You're covering up. You're withholding all your festering smut. You've played the part you're playing now for so long it's no longer authentic. You've become a heretic and a closet skeptic but you've managed to keep yourself just as pathetic. You've lost your tact in the fires of lust and you've lost your heart to so many you don't love. You've soiled your name with your occasional slips and you stained your brain with your self-made precepts. You've never called the shots and you never will, you have a belly for sin you cannot fill, you lie and say that you know the way and "Follow me to a brighter day!", but what you really say is just another way to feed your narcissistic need to bring all the people you know just as awfully low as the places you go. Now that I've said what I've needed to say I'll duck my head and turn away from this mirror, this irony in glass, it reveals the charade just beneath skin, and let's me see my light inside grow dim, pitch by pitch, shade by shade, black creeps in in the cleverest ways.


With an eternal savior to give me meaning, and a handful of love to offer,
~Aaron

I have declared more glorious names for our fish...and here they are.

Goldfish:
The awesome looking one - Mr. Klug & The Full Town Orchestra

The one with poo - Sgt. Eckley

The one without poo - Detective Johansonmumenson

Smallest - Dense Typhoid

Mediumest - Warlock Paste

Beta:
The only one - "Trentch" (he thinks he's real cool)

Algae Eaters:

Twins - Exactly Eleven and Stalin

I just thought you all might like to know that. I hope you are all doing well. You're in my thoughts and prayers. Love from my end. God bless.


"Sing with me child, as my ears are bleeding, The dreams that have now seemed so fleeting, Still your cradle, with no effort sways, Where this monochromatic record is played, And I'll purse my lips and blow kisses goodbye, It's so easy if you never as why, My lungs will contract and give up a brief sigh, Shall we say an appendage has finally died?"

"This may sound harsh, but...I'm a Nazi. Oh that does sound harsh!"

Pray for my friends. I love them all so much and so many of them seem to be hurting inside and out. And I think hugs are for the coolest friends ever. Like every single friend I have. You get all of my hugs until my muscles break down and my brain shuts off. Which could be any second now. Anyways, you know who you are. 

I LOVE YOU

Your friend in Christ,
Aaron



P.S. I really want footy pajamas

I have the Cornerstone tickets in my house on my coffee table.
We have an entire fridge sitting in our basement, cooling our soda pop. His name is Winthrop. I also named our not gold goldfish Mr. Klug And The Full Town Orchestra. I love my friends. I missed Anna Sunstrom's graduation...I died inside.

*sigh*

On another note I love Dir en grey butt tons. Oh, and I decided I want to be a Vintagecore kid. I'm so excited.

Now I'm going to wait for Sam to get off of the internet so we can watch The Negotiator and then go to bed. In completely separate beds. Completely and totally clothed. Like straight people do. Which definitely leaves me single still. Not that I should want it any other way, but sometimes I'm real stupid and think I need a relationship. Or a battleship. Or cheese puffs soaked in boiling water cooked by my private Russian cook/warrior/relentlessly annoying salesman.

*sigh cough sigh*

Sometimes I get inklings...then I remember I'm an idiot with no agenda.

*sharp pain die*

Even when I am loved and love so much it doesn't change the wreck I am
I'm always a nudge away from regret
I'm always corrupt and deprave
I am the Evil and the Serpent
I have been so shallow
I have closed minds 
I tease and I torment
I keep digging a hole of desperation
I have lead astray
I have committed every crime...in my mind
It's no better and it's no worse
All my happiness filled with selfish ambition
I'm so feeble and destroyed
My heart is the house of all unholiness
My veins bleed sin and seduction
I puncture myself and show it for all to see
I always forget about the God who has rescued me
I am Aaron Van Pelt...and there is none less worthy

Okay, I'm gonna do this. I just wrote this. Just NOW. Not very well written, not goog grammar or flow, but just bear with me, because I JUST WROTE IT.

Because when I saw you
My mind could handle the flesh
There was strength in my eyes
But then you smiled and you spoke and walked and fell and you rose
You showed me where your beauty lies

I collapsed at your sight
From then on out
Intoxication seeping through
Every conceivable route

Failure leaking out all my pores
Splashing down in such an accord
Pooling up I sway back and forth
In this torrent of love my strength was a torch

I wasn't weak at the knees
I wasn't dumb struck
I played it real cool
I just completely forgot where I was

And my mind didn't exist
Me eyes watered up
Ears could not unfocus
And I felt my heart erupt

In the midst of my bliss
A distant echoing shout
You leaned in for his kiss
And then my flame died out

much love from my end. God bless

First I will tell you about my night last night:

I went for a walk. I knew where I was going only as far as I could see. The streets were welcoming in their empty stability. They don't exist because of the cars, but, rather, for the cars. I found my way through the rows of houses, which were, unusually (but not surprisingly) uninviting, while thinking of my place and purpose in this world, while coming to no particular conclusions but rather working through what I knew of my current position for the supposed outcome of an conclusion. I made my way towards a corner of houses, with a turn to my right as my only apparent path, I notice a swing set in the distance. I love swings. I see a path inbetween two houses and it leads to a school and its playground. I sit on the swing as a light rain taps on my hat. I think about what I want out of life. I want to feel important. I want to feel needed. I want to feel loved. I want to feel more than I do. I think to myself about my talents in drawing, " why should I not pursue this career? If I have an innate skill in it why would I not want to do it?" I think of how, in my mind, the thought of this career actually causes me grief and frustration. This is not what I want. I want something more. I would very much enjoy screaming for a band. It is so heartfelt and emotional. Yet still very touching to a listener. This, this purpose and feeling, is what I want. I pray to God for strength and wisdom. I sit and decide that I need to take more action than what I have been. Then I think about how there will, someday, be kids playing and having fun on this very playground. It makes me very happy. Then I started to hear faint music past the houses I was by. So, naturally, I followed. I narrowed the source of music down to three houses, and left it open ended. The light above me was flickering its yellow glow across the pavement, an obvious sign to search my pockets. In my coat pocket I feel something, bumpy at one end, but thin and straight for the rest of the object. Naturally, I reach in my pocket. I pull out a Spiderman PEZ dispenser and, naturally, pull back the head to discover lemon flavored PEZ. I ate it and it was amazing, artificially. I headed home the way I came, whilst eating PEZ and singing Eisley. As many of you know I am not a girl, making Eisley not the choice thing for me to sing. But this was not my concern, because I just didn't care if people realized I can't sing like a girl. I walked between the yellow stripes making their appearance down the middle of the street while dodging and hurdling over earth worms. As I left the road and sidewalks I bid them all safe journeys and made my way back into my basement window. As always, I knocked down the curtains.

Sorry this is long, almost done.

I'm real happy about a lot. My shirt is hanging up, which cheers me up. I think I am what I am not. Why do I play myself? Bring me down? I'm gonna get lost, get found, get what's coming to me either way, or any way it doesn't matter. Play lost, play found, play trust into the ground. You see sir, I'm a stupidity fissure. Boils up, the pressure's stuck. I'm in place to lose some face. You'll have that with me. I like to jabber on like this, I find it fun. There's a little point, it makes me happy. Not too good, I know, selfish and rude, I know. So there's no point, if it hurts I'd stop, but I'm a masochist, so I enjoy every minute of this. The punishment is a form of constricting release, it's hard to explain a chaotic peace. Formed in the vacant heart of a lying upstart, it's where truth and lies find their place to coincide. Every second of a calm regret I'm ready to regurgitate into any open ear, so I guess that explains why I put it here. I'm trusting you with my inner thoughts just so you can know how and why my brain clots. Finishing first in the race of life is not what you want. Don't smoke. I'm not complaining, just putting thoughts on as they come to me. Take it how you want. God bless....yes, there's a God. One. Don't search your heart to see the answers, because our hearts lie, our hearts taint and spread their own disease...like peanut butter. Much love from my end. *big hug*

Regret. Frustration. Anxiety. Depression. Thankfulness. Soulless. Heartless. Torment. CHAOS.

...another day just means more for me to screw up entirely. Say it loud and clear...

Separation. Breakdown. Grace. Foolishness. Dread. Worthlessness. Apathy. Punishment. TRUST.

Even though I never stopped caring about you, I feel like I betrayed the world. I replaced every good memory with the times I said the wrong thing/ did the wrong thing/ did'nt do anything at all. When I sat by myself, thinking of what I would do if I was with you, wishing that I would have said something to make you feel at least a little better. I go through all the things I did to others during the day...Now I see EVERY mistake I made...I didn't do this...I couldn't do that...Why didn't I think of helping you this way...I don't want to just be the norm...I want to fuel the fire of conviction in a sinful heart...I want hold you tight when the worst surrounds us...I want to see the light through the shadows cast by doubt and insecurity...I want to see you safely to the best days of your life...I want to care...Lord, I pray, help me to care...



Amen

The past few days stuff has happened...true story.

I went to the library one day, I'm not sure which, but I went there to pick up some books for my mum. So while I was sitting there, by the shelves, looking through these books this older guy starts walking towards me. He says, "How are you?"...I had no idea who he was, but I wanted to be polite. "Uhm, I'm doing good. How are you?"
"Good."...pause...
I said, "Do I know you?"
He says, "Do you play chess?"
"Not that much."
"Because there is a chess tournament in Chicago. We could go."
uhm...yea, so, "Oh, I don't think I'd be much of a challenge for anybody there."
"Well, I could teach you"."
"Thanks, but I've never been much for chess."
"Do you play backgammon?"
and it went on...eventually he gave me his phone number and wants to meet me at the Heartland for some racquetball. Ek. I thought it was hilarious. Ek.

I need people to pray for a friend of mine. It's Amanda Messerly. Two nights ago her house burned down. It destroyed everything but some of the kitchen. And their dog didn't make it out. They are staying in a hotel right now. If you would just keep them in your prayers, please.

As always, awesome sweet fun with Slammo and Tyler. "Humiliation galore." We watched Dark City (which that quote is not from, that quote is from my favorite movie), it was totally great. It had some pretty wonderful magic.

I can't tell who to trust anymore...does that make you lose trust in me? I find it funny how we base our lives in lies. I've lied. You've lied. I think it's funny how we are supposed to be maturing. Yea, right. Let's make gross jokes and say it's "adult". Wahoo.

Much love, God bless

I was a barber. No, a vet. Even still I could not have seen all the ways the sun set its cups of noodles so eloquently on the standing henchmen of yore. 
"Blatant disregard for allllllll my kingdom!", said the first Capt. P.F. P*spit*fillips.
I heard what you're thinking. And the answer is no. I'm not searching the Ever Extending Pole Of Unctuous Hygiene for a cure. You are so silly sometimes. Of course sometimes you're the only one who escaped...alive. The stage is set, the button pressed, the curtain drawn, the curtain shaded and colored, the baskets weaved, molded, shaped like an zebra and cast into film noir. Which is, without misunderstanding, WAY out of its league. You can usually leave it at the door step, but if the step is gone and the door a mere man, buy him a flower, ask him directions and you'll find your way to a place known only as Zimbabwe. Oh, does that bring back memories. Eh, Sam? When we went on our "Eskimo Hunts". Long nights on the "Beach". Fast cars, big rigs, and "Every Newspaper In Town". You know what I mean. Or what about...You know what I mean! "Give it a command", said the second prime minister of The Midwest. But, as always, there was more to come....

These past few days have been the least exciting times I've had in my many times of having times. I'm feeling really empty and easily annoyed. I get mad when people complain to me about things I think are trivial...I care about them, the people...It just gets me down even more than I already am. I go through so many depressing emotions during the day I just end up feeling so drained and lame each night. Not that my nights are much better.

       This is my request: I want to have a good, deep, heart-felt conversation with someone. Anyone. About how you really feel. About what is really having an affect on your life. What you believe. What you want out of life.

   I feel so wasted on mindless bickering. I feel so sheltered by a constant sap of my happiness. I want to make people happy, but it never seems to work. I want to make people see the need for realizing what's important and taking the small issues less...seriously. I think I'm gonna make another post after this and just ramble about nonsense. Because I haven't in a long time.

If you ever want to talk to me or see me I will give you my new address and phone number, when we get it. I know I complain a lot and act all retarded, but you have all been such a blessing to me and I am so proud to know you all.
         Now I'm gonna tell you a war story...

I'm a horrible person and I don't want anybody to debate that. If you do I'm going to get very angry.

I sold my young body for $15. Just FYI.

....love....

I could really use a good conversation right now...the zoo...

Just tell me when you feel a burning sensation. Putting up fliers was never so fun. Thanks buds.

Jonathan came over for a little bit. It was nice to see him again. He was still Jonathan. Oh, memories. Tyler came over, we did stuff? *grunts and shoots gun* Philosophical debate! That was real nice.

Things change and times can get strange but my love remains the same.

Basically I'm sick of having each day be a total waste of time. I want to be a freaking good scringer! I want to go on freaking tour! I want to get married! I want to have a family! I want to be a better person!...I guess I'll just wait it out. It will takes time, and lots of work. Enter doubt, stage left. I don't want to be alone...

There are things in me I never wanted

Leave me alone...but do it by my side

I don't want to have to cope with detachment again...

Such is life

Why do you do this to me every time? Why do you make me want to die? This place reeks of my pain. This place reminds me of memories I wish I didn't have. And now I almost want to forget the good ones. And now I want to be alone...but then I would be without you. But why would you care? Why would you ever care? When did you ever care? Was it the time you held me? Did you then? Or did it just feel good to do it, and that's the reason why? Why is everyone here afraid to speak their mind? Oh it's offensive, keep it inside, that way no one gets hurt!!! No, that way no one can learn. That way we are all okay. That way we don't know that we're sinners. That we're selfish, dirty, worthless, helpless, hopeless, lifeless, spineless, dying, uncaring, faithless hypocrites. Wait though, the thing you don't don't want us to say, the thing that might drive people away, GOD. It is through His grace and mercy we are saved...because we are in dire need of being saved. Why can't I tell you how I feel? Why can't I tell you how much I love you? Hate you? How much I could hold you? Kiss you? Every time I said I would say it you said that you found someone new. Every time I thought you might want me, that maybe I actually did do one thing right for us. Maybe this could work out, maybe you love ME now. Those thoughts were torn apart by the next day we met. Every time I've gone up I've gone down ten times farther. Every time I look up the noose just got longer. I'm just waiting for it to stop growing, stop letting me slide, just stop...watch me die.

I love you mom, dad, kyle, janet, sam, stacey, andrew, hannah, tyler, john, josh, james, anne, and becca...there are so many more...so many that I'm sorry I ever ignored...I hope that I can have forgiveness...I'm not a worthless soul...I will be meaningful...I will tell the truth

Today was amazing. After Stacey told me I'm fake, I started thinking...I thought I have been living as myself. I thought that I had been myself and making people happy was something that I NEEDED to do to be happy with myself. But, as usual, Stacey was right. I can't JUST think about helping people, it's not good for me. I should try and help if I can, but sometimes I just can't. And it's okay. It's gonna take a little getting used to, not trying to do everything for everybody, but I get the feeling it shouldn't be too hard to adjust. I already feel like a huge weight has come off of me. Let me tell you some of the things I've forgotten how much I enjoyed:

Chasing my little brothers around the house like a monster...because they are into Monsters Inc. now, so cute!

Having fun just hanging out with friends and making jokes that have no basis in reality...STICK 'EM UP! The Wickstick. Shmitre (Sombrero+ Shinto hat+ Mitre). oh...good friends

Seeing a good movie with an even greater person

Stretching in the morning and smiling

Wearing whatever the heck I want

Wondering why people feel awkward sitting at the table in the middle of Subway

The smell of my mom's Christmas cookies

Me, Josh, innuendos

People not hearing me when I say their name...or just in general, because I'm quiet

The Princess Bride, While You Were Sleeping...I'ma sap

Not being gay but acting like it! Fun times. Gay stormtroopers!!! HAR HA HAR GAAR!!!

Screaming in the van because I got nowhere else to...

And all the people who set me straight...

Much love from my end
